languages.text: {n}...хотели бы вы крикнуть эти слова в лицо существу, что окутало вас неведомой силой. Но тело отказывается подчиняться — какофония всхлипов, стенаний и рыданий сливается вокруг вас в единый поток, и вы становитесь его частью. Руки отпускают оружие и сами тянутся к лицу, челюсти смыкаются, глаза переполняют колючие слезы. Чужие эмоции проникают столь глубоко в ваше сердце, что вы забываете о жажде крови — и с головой погружаетесь в липкое уныние.{/n}

languages.text: {n}...is what you wanted to shout in the face of the creature who has enveloped you in its strange power. But your body refuses to obey you — the cacophony of sobs, wails, and weeping around you merge into a single stream, and you become part of that stream. Your hands drop your weapon and reach unbidden for your face. Your jaw clenches and your eyes prickle with tears. Foreign emotions pierce your heart so deeply that you forget your bloodlust — and you plunge into despondency, viscous and sticky.{/n}

languages.text: {n}……你本想喊出这句话，但你却似乎被眼前的怪异生物的力量所控制。你的身体拒绝服从你。你周围的呜咽、哀号与哭泣汇成了一股洪流，而你也成为了这洪流的一部分。你放下了武器，不由自主地摸着自己的脸。你的下巴紧缩着，你的眼睛被泪水刺痛。来自外界的情感深深地刺痛了你的心，那种感觉是如此疼痛，甚至让你忘记了杀戮的欲望。你陷入了一团粘稠、钝厚的绝望之中。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...is what you wanted to shout in the face of the creature who has enveloped you in its strange power. But your body refuses to obey you — the cacophony of sobs, wails, and weeping around you merge into a single stream, and you become part of that stream. Your hands drop your weapon and reach unbidden for your face. Your jaw clenches and your eyes prickle with tears. Foreign emotions pierce your heart so deeply that you forget your bloodlust — and you plunge into despondency, viscous and sticky.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}……你本想喊出这句话，但你却似乎被眼前的怪异生物的力量所控制。你的身体拒绝服从你。你周围的呜咽、哀号与哭泣汇成了一股洪流，而你也成为了这洪流的一部分。你放下了武器，不由自主地摸着自己的脸。你的下巴紧缩着，你的眼睛被泪水刺痛。来自外界的情感深深地刺痛了你的心，那种感觉是如此疼痛，甚至让你忘记了杀戮的欲望。你陷入了一团粘稠、钝厚的绝望之中。{/n}

languages.text: {n}... Eso es lo que habrías querido gritar a la cara de la criatura que te ha envuelto con su extraño poder. No obstante, tu cuerpo se niega a obedecer. La cacofonía de sollozos, lamentos y llantos a tu alrededor se unen en una sola corriente de la que pasas a formar parte. Tus manos sueltan el arma y se dirigen sin control hacia tu cara. Tu mandíbula se aprieta y tus ojos escuecen por las lágrimas. Las emociones ajenas atraviesan tu corazón con tal profundidad que olvidas tu furia para caer en un desaliento viscoso y pegajoso.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...is what you wanted to shout in the face of the creature who has enveloped you in its strange power. But your body refuses to obey you — the cacophony of sobs, wails, and weeping around you merge into a single stream, and you become part of that stream. Your hands drop your weapon and reach unbidden for your face. Your jaw clenches and your eyes prickle with tears. Foreign emotions pierce your heart so deeply that you forget your bloodlust — and you plunge into despondency, viscous and sticky.{/n}

La cacofonía de sollozos, lamentos y llantos a tu alrededor se unen en una sola corriente de la que pasas a formar parte. Tus manos sueltan el arma y se dirigen sin control hacia tu cara. Tu mandíbula se aprieta y tus ojos escuecen por las lágrimas. Las emociones ajenas atraviesan tu corazón con tal profundidad que olvidas tu furia para caer en un desaliento viscoso y pegajoso.{/n}

languages.text: {n}…その奇妙な力に包まれた生き物を前にして、あなたは叫びたかった。だが、あなたの肉体は自分自身に従うことを拒んだ。 嗚咽、慟哭、そして泣き声の不協和音があなたの周りでひとつの流れに合流し、あなたはその流れの一部となる。あなたの手は武器を捨て、顔に手を伸ばす。顎が歪み、涙で目が痛む。異質な感情が胸に深く突き刺さり、血への渇望を忘れる。そしてあなたは、粘りつくような、落胆へと陥っていった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...is what you wanted to shout in the face of the creature who has enveloped you in its strange power. But your body refuses to obey you — the cacophony of sobs, wails, and weeping around you merge into a single stream, and you become part of that stream. Your hands drop your weapon and reach unbidden for your face. Your jaw clenches and your eyes prickle with tears. Foreign emotions pierce your heart so deeply that you forget your bloodlust — and you plunge into despondency, viscous and sticky.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}…その奇妙な力に包まれた生き物を前にして、あなたは叫びたかった。だが、あなたの肉体は自分自身に従うことを拒んだ。 嗚咽、慟哭、そして泣き声の不協和音があなたの周りでひとつの流れに合流し、あなたはその流れの一部となる。あなたの手は武器を捨て、顔に手を伸ばす。顎が歪み、涙で目が痛む。異質な感情が胸に深く突き刺さり、血への渇望を忘れる。そしてあなたは、粘りつくような、落胆へと陥っていった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}... wolltest du der Kreatur ins Gesicht schreien, die dich mit ihrer merkwürdigen Macht umschlossen hatte. Doch dein Körper weigert sich, dir zu gehorchen. Die Kakophonie der schluchzenden, heulenden und weinenden Stummen um dich herum vermischt sich zu einem einzigen Strom, und du wirst Teil dieses Stroms. Deine Hände lassen deine Waffe fallen und tasten ungebeten nach deinem Gesicht. Du beißt die Zähne zusammen und dir schießen die Tränen in die Augen. Fremde Emotionen bohren sich so tief in dein Herz, dass du deine Blutlust vergisst — und in die Verzweiflung abtauchst, zähflüssig und klebrig.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...is what you wanted to shout in the face of the creature who has enveloped you in its strange power. But your body refuses to obey you — the cacophony of sobs, wails, and weeping around you merge into a single stream, and you become part of that stream. Fremde Emotionen bohren sich so tief in dein Herz, dass du deine Blutlust vergisst — und in die Verzweiflung abtauchst, zähflüssig und klebrig.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous tentez de crier ces mots face à la créature qui vous a {mf|capturé|capturée} dans son étrange emprise, mais votre corps refuse de vous obéir. La cacophonie de sanglots, de gémissements et de pleurs qui vous entoure se mue en un flot ininterrompu et semble vous absorber. Vous lâchez votre arme et vos mains se dirigent spontanément vers votre visage. Votre mâchoire se crispe et vos yeux s'emplissent de larmes. Des émotions étrangères vous transpercent le cœur si profondément que vous oubliez vos pensées meurtrières, avant de plonger dans l'abattement le plus total, visqueux et collant.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...is what you wanted to shout in the face of the creature who has enveloped you in its strange power. But your body refuses to obey you — the cacophony of sobs, wails, and weeping around you merge into a single stream, and you become part of that stream. Your hands drop your weapon and reach unbidden for your face. Your jaw clenches and your eyes prickle with tears. Foreign emotions pierce your heart so deeply that you forget your bloodlust — and you plunge into despondency, viscous and sticky.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous tentez de crier ces mots face à la créature qui vous a {mf|capturé|capturée} dans son étrange emprise, mais votre corps refuse de vous obéir. La cacophonie de sanglots, de gémissements et de pleurs qui vous entoure se mue en un flot ininterrompu et semble vous absorber. Vous lâchez votre arme et vos mains se dirigent spontanément vers votre visage. Votre mâchoire se crispe et vos yeux s'emplissent de larmes. Des émotions étrangères vous transpercent le cœur si profondément que vous oubliez vos pensées meurtrières, avant de plonger dans l'abattement le plus total, visqueux et collant.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Seni tuhaf gücüyle sarmalayan yaratığın suratına bu şekilde bağırmak istesen de bedenin sana itaat etmeyi reddediyor. Etrafındaki feryat, figan ve hıçkırık sesleri birleşerek tek bir sele dönüşüyor ve sen de bu sele kapılıyorsun. Ellerin, tuttukları silahı bırakıyor ve başlarına buyruk hâlde yüzüne dokunuyorlar. Çenen kilitleniyor ve gözlerin yaşlarla doluyor. Yabancı duygular kalbini o kadar derinden yarıyor ki kana susamışlığını unutup yoğun ve yapış yapış bir bunalıma sürükleniyorsun.{/n}
